answers.author: Elizabeth Fields
answers.text:
The Town of Leesburg (VA) has a "special event" permit process that sets fees for events that require town services, like traffic control or street clean up.  Based on the applicant's description of their event, staff estimate the number of personnel needed and apply a standard cost per hour/per person, plus any other hard costs (rental of temporary fencing, for example).  You can contact the Leesburg Parks & Recreation Department for more information (www.leesburgva.gov).

author: Christopher Raths
text:
The Township has recieved a request to host a very popular realty tv show for six weeks. It will have an impact on traffic and logistics within the community. Although police service expenses will be re-couped from detail rates other expense will not. Have any communites sought and received a host fee and for what amounts?
Thanks
Chris Raths 
Roxbury Township NJ.
